participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative and nostalgic, Emily enjoys expressing her love for childhood memories and hobbies. She is open-minded and friendly, often sharing her experiences with others.
participant_1.background: my favorite toy as a child was my lite brite. I was born in the early 80s. I take dance lessons once a week. I also like old school hip hop. I love new kids on the block.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Down-to-earth and hardworking, Jake has a love for nature and animals. He enjoys spending time outdoors and values family traditions.
participant_2.background: i have three arabian horses. i help tend the fields. my father is a farmer. i like to ride horses. i like to listen to rock music while working.

content.text: yes   but i wish i still had my lite brite doll from when i was a child
why do you want that doll?
i like to ride horses. I have three arabian horses. Have you ever seen a horse eating another horse?
i have a couple horses   and they like to rock   too
that's cool! i like to listen to rock music while working and riding horses
i love those bands   i listen to rumours at least a few times a month
i help tend the fields. Have you ever been to a fields with horses eating another horse?
you are so lucky   i cannot have a horse until i graduate
Why can not you have a horse?
what kind of horses do you have
yes   it is my favorite color   how old are you
yes   i found my old lite brite from the eighties   it was my fav   toy
my father is a farmer. who are your farmer?
i like listening to country music and working on my farm
